title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Crypto Google Searches Surge, Peaking in October Before Tapering Off
description: Over the 90-day stretch from August 13 to November 11, 2023, bitcoin (BTC) along with a broad array of crypto assets have posted substantial increases. Data from Google Trends in this timeframe indicates a surge in searches for “bitcoin,” “crypto,” and “ethereum,” with these terms achieving a peak popularity score of 100 by late October. […]

title: 2024 Counter-Strike Major Schedule Unveiled
description: In a long-anticipated announcement, Perfect World Esports has officially confirmed Shanghai, China, as the host city for the second Counter-Strike Major of 2024. This confirmation follows months of speculation and rumors regarding the major shake-up in Valve’s Counter-Strike Major schedule. title: Unleash the Inferno: MW3 Zombies Scorcher Wonder Weapon Explained
description: With the worldwide release of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, players are once again descending into the beloved Zombies mode, a thrilling experience brimming with new features and challenges.
